page.title: 03SCHOOL BUILDINGS.
page.content: The present school was{erected in 1915 and was{occupied on February 6th,1916. Previously to this,the school was run in the chapel schoolroom.{Official Log {Books were kept from 1867}_ No entries are available prior to that. The new building consisted of two classrooms,divided by a partition and a toilet block in the yard.Heating was by coal fires. The present building utilises the "old" but a Hall,small kitchen and new toilet block have been added,the old ones having been demolished.The hall now houses the Infant section while,of the other two classrooms,one houses the Juniors and the other is used as an Audio/Visual area,resource centre and for storage.Heating is by oil. There is a large playground beyond which is a very large playing-field.
